Data Self-Portrait is a unique application for tracking life data and artistic visualization. By recording daily data such as sleep, consumption, mood and activities, the application transforms the dull numbers into flowing abstract art graphics, allowing you to "see" your life patterns from a new perspective. The minimalist information visualization design style, combined with the colorful data flow effect, enables your personalized data portrait to continuously evolve with each data addition, showcasing your unique life trajectory. It supports data statistics analysis, historical record management and data export functions. All data is stored locally, ensuring the protection of your privacy and security.

UNITEL Money é a aplicação para telemóvel para a utilização e gestão da nova carteira digital de Angola! Nela poderás abrir a tua conta UNITEL Money e carregar a carteira com um depósito, fazer levantamentos, transferências e compra de recargas UNITEL. É fácil e é para todos!

description:
PAYPAY dedica-se a fornecer soluções de pagamento móvel de terceiros 'inclusivas e rápidas' para o comércio electrónico em África, com a visão de 'tornar o financiamento mais inclusivo e os pagamentos mais convenientes'.
Para além das funções básicas de carregamentos, transferências e levantamentos seguros e rápidos, pode facilmente pagar bens e serviços através da nossa aplicação de pagamento móvel, desde que o destinatário seja um utilizador PAYPAY.
Deve ter uma conta para enviar e receber pagamentos, por isso se o beneficiário não tiver uma conta PAYPAY, é fácil inscrever-se numa conta. O registo de uma conta é gratuito!

Com o lançamento do BAIDirecto Particular os clientes poderão efecuar várias operações como transferências, aderir ao BAIDirecto sem necessidade de se deslocar a um balcão físico, fazer crédito instantâneo, carregar o seu cartão Kamba e rentabilizar os seus fundos.

Unlock the full power of your digital assets with RedotPay — a global stablecoin-based card and all-in-one payment app bridging digital currencies with everyday spending. Top up funds, spend, send — RedotPay makes it simple, secure, and borderless. With RedotPay, payments are always at your fingertips!
 
Join 5M+ users across 100+ countries and transform the way you manage crypto and local currencies today.
 
WHY CHOOSE REDOTPAY?
 • Spend crypto like cash at 130M+ merchants, POS locations & ATMs.
 • Send multi-market payouts with near-instant processing.

PAY WITH CRYPTO, WORLDWIDE
 • Stablecoin-Based Cards (Virtual & Physical): Pay with BTC, ETH, USDT, USDC & more at 130M+ merchants globally.
 • Mobile Payment: Tap to pay instantly online or in-store.
 • ATM Withdrawals: Instantly convert crypto to local currency — travel worry-free.
 • High Limits, Low Fees: Spend up to $100K per transaction at competitive rates.

ACCESS CREDIT WITH CRYPTO
 • Crypto Credit Account: Unlock credit against Bitcoin (BTC), Ethereum (ETH), Solana (SOL), Tron (TRX), Ripple (XRP), Binance Coin (BNB), Toncoin (TON), or stablecoins without selling.
 • Flexible Repayment: No compounding interest or hidden fees — repay anytime.
Grow While Spending: Earn passive yield and use rewards instantly with your card.

FIAT ON-RAMP & GLOBAL PAYOUT
 • Currency Accounts: Deposit Euro (EUR) or Pound (GBP) via bank transfer and instantly swap to stablecoins.
 • Global Payout: Send crypto and let recipients receive local currency (e.g., BRL) in their bank accounts within minutes.
 • Seamless On/Off Ramp: Withdraw cash worldwide at ATMs — fast, secure, and worry-free travel. 
 • Online Shopping: Use crypto seamlessly for everyday purchases.

WALLET
 • Multi-Currency Wallet: Manage both crypto & local currencies in one secure app.
 • Free Transfers: Send crypto or local currency to friends and enjoy near-instant fund transfers.

REWARDS, GIFTS & VOUCHER
 • Referral Program: Invite friends and earn up to 40% commission on their transactions.
 • Gift Feature: Send personalized crypto gifts with custom cards & messages.
 • Vouchers & Cashback: Enjoy discounts, promotional rewards, and reduced fees.

COMPLIANCE & SECURITY YOU CAN TRUST
 • Globally Licensed: Authorized in multiple regions for money services, custody, and crypto services.
 • Multi-Layered Protection: Safeguard your account with 2FA, passkeys, anti-phishing codes, and gesture passwords.
 • Seamless Onboarding: ID verification under 5 minutes, giving you secure access anytime.

JOIN THE MOVEMENT
Be part of our growing global community and experience the future of borderless finance! Download RedotPay today and begin your journey toward financial freedom and inclusion.
 
Stay connected for updates, features & community events:
 • Website: www.RedotPay.com
 • Twitter: www.twitter.com/RedotPay
 • Instagram: www.instagram.com/RedotPay
 • Facebook: www.facebook.com/RedotPayOfficial
 • LinkedIn: www.linkedin.com/company/RedotPayOfficial
 • Telegram: t.me/RedotPay
 • Discord: discord.gg/PCUd2JM2KJ
For more info, please contact: Support@RedotPay.com
For support, feedback & complaints please visit: https://url.hk/cs/as

Pode ficar tranquilo, pois o Banco Sol disponibiliza um novo canal extremamente seguro de acesso às suas contas bancárias.

Basta mover um dedo.

There’s never been a better time to check out PayPal, the trusted way to pay
Say hello to PayPal+, our free loyalty programme that helps you make the most of your money every time you shop with PayPal

SEND & RECEIVE MONEY​
A simple, secure way to quickly send & receive money to friends and family. With encryption technology, we go the distance to help make sure your money transfers are secure

ITS LOYALTY FOR ALL. AND ITS ALL FOR FREE
PayPal+ is the loyalty programme that rewards you with more points, in more ways. Use them almost anywhere PayPal is accepted. And it’s all for free, with no fees and no caps*​
*Rewards are earned as points under the PayPal+ rewards programme. To start earning, you must be enrolled in PayPal+. If you are not yet enrolled, you can sign in the PayPal app. PayPal+ Terms and conditions apply.

MULTIPLY YOUR POINTS WITH THE PAYPAL DEBIT CARD​
Earn up to 10x PayPal+ points when you pay with your PayPal Debit Card, everywhere Mastercard® is accepted. Add it to your mobile wallet, use it in person, and at PayPal checkout to watch your points grow*​
* Set up and activation required. Terms and conditions apply

BUY NOW, PAY LATER​
Keep track of all your PayPal Pay in 3 repayments.* Plus, earn points whenever you use Pay in 3
*Pay in 3 subject to status. Unregulated credit. Available for purchases £20-£3000. Consider if affordable and impact on other borrowing

SEND MONEY GLOBALLY
Send money to friends and family abroad in over 110 countries – or get even more delivery options with Xoom
*Fees and restrictions apply. Transaction, currency conversion, and other fees may apply

MANAGE YOUR SUBSCRIPTIONS ​
Keep track of your different subscriptions at the subscription hub. Easily view, update, or cancel subscriptions, while enjoying updates on recurring payments. Manage recurring payments all in one place. 

POOL MONEY TOGETHER​
Collect money in advance for group gifts, shared experiences, and more and skip the hassle of reimbursement afterward.​
*An account with PayPal is required to create a Pool. Terms and limits apply

PAY HOW YOU WANT​
Add your debit or credit cards* or link your bank accounts for extra flexibility at checkout. You’ll even be able to continue collecting rewards points**
*Using your credit card through your PayPal wallet may impact your rights under Section 75 of the Consumer Credit Act. This means you may lose the right to hold the merchant or your credit card provider jointly liable if you don’t get the goods or services you paid for (if they cost between £100 and £30,000)​
**Subject to issuer’s applicable reward programme terms and conditions

PayPal UK Ltd is authorised and regulated by the Financial Conduct Authority (FCA) as an electronic money institution (firm reference number 994790); in relation to its regulated consumer credit activities (firm reference number 996405); and for the provision of cryptocurrency services (firm reference number 1000741). Some products and services, such as PayPal Pay in 3 and PayPal Working Capital, are not regulated by the FCA and may offer a lower level of protection. Please read product terms for further details. Binance is the world’s largest cryptoasset marketplace by trading volume*. Trusted by 250 million users worldwide, the Binance platform allows you to buy, sell, and hold up to 350 cryptoassets, including Bitcoin (BTC), Ether (ETH), Solana (SOL), Notcoin (NOT) and Pepe (PEPE) with some of the lowest trading fees in the market.

Risk Warning: Don’t invest unless you’re prepared to lose all the money you invest. This is a high-risk investment and you should not expect to be protected if something goes wrong. 
Not financial advice. All trading carries risk. Only risk capital you can afford to lose.
Take 2 mins to learn more:
https://www.binance.com/en-GB/legal/risk-warning.

Binance UK is presently not regulated or authorised by the UK Financial Conduct Authority ("FCA). Investments in cryptoassets are not covered by the Financial Ombudsman Service (“FOS”) or subject to protection under the Financial Services Compensation Scheme (“FSCS”).

Legal Entity: Nest Services Limited, trading as Binance, is the entity ultimately responsible for the Binance Services offered to UK based users through the Binance platform.

*by trading volume - Source: https://coinmarketcap.com/rankings/exchanges


Here's a small sample of what you can do on the Binance App:

- Choose from 350+ listed cryptoassets, set up recurring buys and price alerts, and trade with an arsenal of trading tools at your fingertips.
- Fund your account with a variety of payment options, including credit/debit card, P2P, and bank transfer.
- Automate your cryptoasset investments in a way that suits your preferences using Auto-Invest.
- All user funds are held 1:1 and protected by a Secure Asset Fund for Users (SAFU) worth $1 billion.
- Our ecosystem is built from the ground-up with state-of-the-art security measures, including real-time risk monitoring, stringent KYC protocols, and advanced end-to-end data encryption, to name a few.
- Participate in Binance Launchpad, or grow your portfolio with trading bots.
- In addition to an expansive, constantly-updated FAQ section, our 24/7 live chat customer support is available in English.

Unlock the world of Bitcoin and cryptocurrency trading with Bybit

Join 78 million users to experience seamless, secure and reliable cryptocurrency trading. Trade, manage and grow your Bitcoin (BTC) and cryptocurrency portfolio today with our simple and innovative platform. No matter if you're a beginner or a professional, or eyeing Bitcoin (BTC), Ethereum (ETH), Solana (SOL), Mantle (MNT) or other major cryptocurrencies, we're here to make your trading seamless, secure and reliable.

Bitcoin and crypto trading simplified
Our mission is to simplify the purchase of popular cryptocurrencies such as Bitcoin (BTC), Ethereum (ETH), Ripple (XRP), Solana (SOL), Cardano (ADA), Chainlink (LINK), Polkadot (DOT), PEPE. Mantle (MNT), Litecoin (LTC), Dogecoin (DOGE) and Hedera (HBAR). Trade Spot and Derivatives pairs easily with fiat or cryptocurrency, including BTCUSDT, ETHUSDT and XRPUSDT contracts.

Our trading features
- Derivatives trading: Trade Perpetuals, Futures and Options seamlessly with advanced risk management tools.
- Spot trading: Enjoy features like Take Profit/Stop Loss (TP/SL) to maximize your trading efficiency. 
- Easy trade: Capture opportunities in the fast-moving Bitcoin (BTC) and cryptocurrency market with ease.
- Large trades & positions tracking: Track large Bitcoin (BTC) and cryptocurrency trades with real-time updates. 
- Bybit Card: Spend your Bitcoin (BTC), Ethereum (ETH), Solana (SOL), Mantle (MNT), USDT and other cryptos at millions of merchants worldwide online and in-store to earn up to 10% cashback in crypto.
- Bybit Pay: Send or spend Bitcoin (BTC), Ethereum (ETH), Solana (SOL), Mantle (MNT) and other crypto instantly—with zero gas fees and fast, secure settlement.
- Bybit Alpha: Seamless entry into the world of on-chain trading—bridging Bybit users to DeFi, NFTs and dApps through a fully integrated Web3 ecosystem.
- Bybit asset management: Build your portfolio with tools like Bybit Savings and Liquidity Mining and maximize your gains from Bitcoin (BTC) to newly-listed cryptocurrencies. 
- Copy Trading: Follow expert traders and apply their strategies in your Bitcoin (BTC) and cryptocurrency trades. 
- Bybit NFT Marketplace: Buy, sell or trade NFTs with ease in an expanding marketplace.

Why choose Bybit for your Bitcoin and cryptocurrency trades?

Instant crypto trading
Trade Bitcoin (BTC), Ethereum (ETH), Ripple (XRP), Solana (SOL), Mantle (MNT) PEPE and other crytpocurrencies instantly using credit cards, bank transfers or other payment methods.

Optimized experience
Our streamlined UX for Spot and Derivatives trading makes trading Bitcoin (BTC), Ethereum (ETH), Solana (SOL), Mantle (MNT) and other cryptocurrencies easier than ever.

Seamless deposits and transfers
Transfer major cryptocurrencies like Bitcoin (BTC), Ethereum (ETH), Solana (SOL), Mantle (MNT) and Ripples (XRP) quickly across multiple wallets with full customization options.

Portfolio diversification
Trade Bitcoin (BTC), Ethereum (ETH), Ripple (XRP), Solana (SOL), Mantle (MNT), PEPE and other cryptocurrencies on Spot or Derivatives markets, with leveraged tokens, crypto loans and margin trading on offer.

description:
BCI MOBILE, Mudamos a nossa aplicação por si. 

A nova app BCI MOBILE está moderna, segura, rápida e intuitiva ao seu utilizador.

Faça download da app a partir de um telemóvel digital ou tablet e poderá:

Controle - Aceda às suas finanças de forma rápida, consulte os seus movimentos e extratos e faça transferências a qualquer hora.

Controle - Confirme facilmente a utilização dos seus cartões, os juros das suas poupanças e investimentos e veja antecipadamente as datas de pagamento dos seus compromissos de crédito.

Pague – Utilize a aplicação para pagar os seus fornecedores via transferências, liquidar o seu cartão de crédito, fazer o carregamento do seu cartão pré-pago, pagar impostos via 
RUPE. E, a partir do seu internet banking pode também fazer pagamentos de salários por ficheiro.

BCI, mudamos por si.

16 million+ customers send, receive, spend and grow their money internationally with Wise. It’s the fast, simple way to move money in 160 countries and 40 currencies. Products available depend on where you live. Check wise.com or download the app to see what’s available for you.

— International money transfers —
• Send money to 70+ countries, fast
• Get the mid-market exchange rate, like on Google, for every money transfer
• On average, 64% of transfers arrive in under 20 seconds, and 95% arrive within 24 hours
• Secure your transfers with two-factor authentication, encryption and biometrics

— The debit card that’s always got the right currency —
• Spend or withdraw cash in more than 160+ countries
• If you don’t have the local currency, we’ll auto-convert what you have with the lowest possible price
• Freeze and unfreeze your card, and update your digital card details

— Get paid like a local —
• Get your own UK account number and sort code, European IBAN, Australian account details and more, as if you had local bank accounts around the world
• Use these account details to get paid in multiple currencies for free, and for direct debits
• Keep up-to-date with instant push notifications for every transaction

— Hold 40 currencies and convert between them instantly —
• No monthly fee and no maintenance fee to keep money in your account, in most cases
• Convert between currencies instantly, at the real exchange rate, for a super-low fee
• Auto-convert currencies at specific rates, and keep up to date with exchange rates with Rate Alerts

— Put your money to work with Assets —
• Try Interest or Stocks in a few taps. Available in the UK, Singapore and multiple EEA countries, for now
• Capital at risk, growth not guaranteed

— A better business account for going global —
• Pay invoices and bills faster, at a better exchange rate
• Use account details to get paid by clients and customers around the world
• Connect to supported platforms like Amazon, Stripe, Xero, and more

Wise is regulated by local authorities around the world.

Send from: GBP (British pound), EUR (Euro), USD (US dollar), AUD (Australian dollar), BGN (Bulgarian lev), BRL (Brazilian real), CAD (Canadian dollar), CHF (Swiss franc), CZK (Czech koruna), DKK (Danish krone), HKD (Hong Kong dollar), HUF (Hungarian forint), JPY (Japanese yen), MYR (Malaysian ringgit), NOK (Norwegian krone), NZD (New Zealand dollar), PLN (Polish zloty), RON (New Romanian leu), SEK (Swedish krona), SGD (Singapore dollar)
Send to: EUR (Euro), USD (US dollar), GBP (British pound), AED (UAE dirham), ARS (Argentine peso), AUD (Australian dollar), BDT (Bangladeshi taka), BGN (Bulgarian lev), BRL (Brazilian real), CAD (Canadian dollar), CHF (Swiss franc), CLP (Chilean peso), CNY (Chinese yuan), CRC (Costa Rican colón), CZK (Czech koruna), DKK (Danish krone), EGP (Egyptian pound), GHS (Ghanaian cedi), GEL (Georgian lari), HKD (Hong Kong dollar), HUF (Hungarian forint), IDR (Indonesian rupiah), ILS (Israeli shekel), INR (Indian rupee), JPY (Japanese yen), KES (Kenyan shilling), KRW (South Korean won), LKR (Sri Lankan rupee), MAD (Moroccan dirham), MXN (Mexican peso), MYR (Malaysian ringgit), NPR (Nepalese rupee), NOK (Norwegian krone), NZD (New Zealand dollar), PEN (Peruvian sol), PHP (Philippine peso), PKR (Pakistan rupee), PLN (Polish zloty), RON (Romanian leu), SEK (Swedish krona), SGD (Singapore dollar), THB (Thai baht), TRY (Turkish lira), UAH (Ukrainian hryvnia), VND (Vietnamese dong), ZAR (South African rand), ZMW (Zambian kwacha)

Capital at risk. Past performance does not guarantee future growth. Interest is an investment service, availability and provider vary by location. Please check Wise.com/interest for more information.

Join the 60+ million customers worldwide who use our app to spend, send, and save smarter.

This description is relevant for UK residents only.

Make your spend, well-spent

- Pay any way, with physical cards, virtual cards, single-use virtual cards for extra protection, Google or Apple Pay — you name it
- Spend abroad like a local with great exchange rates (fees additional to the rate provided may apply)
- Easily track and analyse your spending
- Link your external bank accounts to Revolut to stay on top of all your spending in one place
- Design a physical card you vibe with (fees may apply). Want to add a little luxury? Upgrade to Metal for a shiny steel card
- Not enough? Level up to Ultra to bag an exclusive platinum-plated card (Paid Plan T&Cs and subscription fees apply)
- Set your kids up for financial success. Get them a free Revolut ＜18 account, with their own card, so they can learn about money in a safe and fun way

Send money near, far, wherever they are

- Request or send 30+ currencies with a tap to anyone, anywhere
- Chat, send, and receive money, in one place. Whatever your plans, transfers are instant between your Revolut friends
- No more awkward money chats! Split, chat, and settle bills in one place. You can even share a fun GIF to diffuse any tension

Save the interest-ing way

- Grow your money in GBP, EUR, and USD, with annual interest paid daily, directly into your account
- Access your savings whenever you need to, with zero penalties or fees
- Build your savings effortlessly — set up recurring transfers and round up spare change to stash cash without even trying

Explore investments (Capital at risk. Content is for UK residents only)

- Start investing from $1 (other fees may apply)
- Choose from 2,000+ stocks to invest in some of the world's most popular companies
- Enjoy commission-free stock trading within your monthly allowance (other fees may apply)
- Access our trading Learn courses and quizzes

Investment services are provided by Revolut Trading Ltd (No. 11567840) which is authorised and regulated by the Financial Conduct Authority (FRN: 933846). Registered address: 30 South Colonnade, London E14 5HX, United Kingdom.
End the overspend

- Get instant spending notifications to keep track of every payment
- Use smart budgeting and analytics tools to stop wondering where your money went, and start telling it where to go
- Worried about missing upcoming payments or subscription charges? Don’t be — we’ll notify you beforehand

Looking to go even further? Upgrade to one of our paid plans to get exclusive cards, more benefits, even cooler perks, you name it. Pick the plan that’s right for you: Plus, Premium, Metal or Ultra (Paid Plan T&Cs and subscription fees apply).

Unlock security features that you control

- Freeze and unfreeze your card in a tap
- Use single-use cards with details that regenerate each time, for an extra layer of protection
- Set spending limits and get notifications to keep track of your money

How we protect your money

- Your savings are protected by the FSCS through our partner banks – up to £85k. Subject to eligibility, visit the FSCS website for more information
- Our sophisticated fraud prevention system flags high-risk transactions and pings you an alert, so you can spot scams and nip ‘em in the bud
- It’s our business to protect your data, and we take it seriously. Extensive identity verification keeps sign-ups secure, and your account is protected with passcodes and biometrics
- We’re available 24/7 via our in-app customer support

Revolut Ltd (No. 08804411) is authorised by the Financial Conduct Authority under the Electronic Money Regulations 2011 (FRN: 900562). Registered address: 30 South Colonnade, London E14 5HX, United Kingdom.

developer: The Standard Bank of South Africa Limited
description:
SB24 – Your bank always at hand

Make international transfers, pay bills, check balances privately, and access instant statements — all in a simple, fast, and secure way, now with a new look. 

Download the SB24 app today.

Esta aplicação é exclusiva para clientes do Banco BIC, SA que adiram ao serviço Mobile Banking para iOS.

O Banco BIC Mobile Banking para iOS é uma aplicação bancária fiável e segura. Permite o acesso a contas, pagamentos, transferências e cartões. A informação que disponibiliza, através de uma nova experiência de interação, navegação, consulta e validação sob tecnologia “touch” permite ter o seu Banco sempre à mão. Dirija-se a um dos nossos balcões, subscreva o serviço, e terá um conjunto de operações que simplificam a gestão financeira, acessível de uma forma rápida, cómoda e segura, sem necessidade de se deslocar ao Banco.
Faz do teu telefone a tua carteira, consulta o teu saldo, envia e levanta dinheiro num agente ou num ATM, faz pagamentos e compra recargas onde estiveres e a qualquer hora do dia.

Afrimoney é uma solução rápida e segura de dinheiro móvel, desenvolvida pela Africell que te permite transferir e levantar dinheiro, fazer pagamentos físicos e virtuais de produtos e serviços, verificar saldo, através do teu celular.

UNITEL Money é a aplicação para telemóvel para os Agentes UNITEL Money que permite a utilização e gestão da nova carteira digital de Angola! Nela o Agente poderá abrir contas a clientes UNITEL Money e carregar a carteira com depósitos, fazer levantamentos, transferências e venda de recargas UNITEL. É fácil e é para todos!

Conheça a NOSSA App. Simples, rápido e fácil.

Descarregue a APP, registe-se e comece hoje a beneficiar das vantagens de ter a NOSSA Seguros na palma da sua mão!

A NOSSA App Seguros permite-lhe, de uma forma simples e prática, consultar e gerir as suas apólices onde e quando quiser. Pode ainda consultar a sua documentação, aceder às principais funcionalidades para cada tipo de seguro, simular e subscrever seguros Auto e Viagem, consultar o histórico de todas as simulações efectuadas, recibos pagos e não pagos, efectuar pagamentos, verificar as campanhas em vigor, visualizar todos os produtos disponíveis, aceder ao seu cartão de Saúde digital NOSSA e ainda verificar a localização das agências NOSSA.

A NOSSA App é fácil de entender, rápida de utilizar e está disponível 24h por dia, 7 dias por semana.

Ser Cliente NOSSA Seguros são só vantagens. A nova aplicação criada seguramente a pensar em si!

A NOSSA App, disponível gratuitamente para iOS, apresenta um mundo de vantagens para os Clientes NOSSA.

MyFin - Your Digital Wallet!

As a licensed company approved by the Bulgarian National Bank, MyFin offers you security comparable to that of a traditional bank, all while saving you time and money.


With MyFin, you'll enjoy:

- Free IBAN: Obtain your own IBAN directly through your smartphone within minutes, simply by registering on the app.

- Currency Exchange Without Fees: Exchange currencies without incurring any additional fees.

- POS Payments in Various Countries: MyFin serves as your digital wallet, enabling fast and secure payments in multiple countries.

- Cash Deposits via ATM (available exclusively for Fibank ATMs): Easily add cash to your MyFin wallet at Fibank ATMs without any extra charges.

- Utility Payments and Vignette Purchases: MyFin provides the convenience of paying utility bills and purchasing vignettes for your car directly from your phone, all without any fees.

- Electronic food vouchers! Now you can easily manage and check your voucher balance directly through the app. Available exclusively in Bulgaria.


- Payment with QR code: Experience the convenience of making payments more easily than ever before with our new QR code payment feature. Simply scan and pay directly from your smartphone, enhancing your payment experience.


- Investments - You can now trade stocks and ETFs! We offer you direct trading on the stock market. Invest quickly and easily and monitor your investments at any time.

- Card Management: Take control of your cards by freezing them or setting customized limits for payments, ATM withdrawals, and geographical regions.



- Personalized card design: Make your MyFin card uniquely yours with our personalized card design feature. Customize the design of your card effortlessly, reflecting your individual style and preferences.



 

MyFin - Твоя дигитален портфейл!

Като лицензирано дружество от БНБ MyFin ти дава сигурност на банкова институция, позволявайки ти да спестяваш време и пари.



 С MyFin получаваш:

 - Безплатен IBAN.  Отваряш собствена сметка с IBAN, напълно безплатно за няколко минути през своето мобилно устройство.

 - Обмяна на валута, без такса.

 - Плащания на POS - терминал в различни държави. MyFin е дигитален портфейл, който ти позволява да правиш плащания бързо и сигрурно в различни държави.

 - Внасяне на пари в брой през банкомат, без такса. 

 - Комунални услуги, винетка. MyFin ти дава възможност да плащаш своите битови услуги, както и да си закупиш винетка.

- Плащане с QR код:  Изживейте удобството на правене на плащания по-лесно от всякога с нашата нова функция за плащане с QR код. Просто сканирайте и платете директно от вашия смартфон, подобрявайки вашето преживяване при плащанията.


- Инвестиции - Вече може да търгуваш с акции и ETF-и!  Предлагаме ти директна търговия на пазара с акции. Инвестирай бързо и лесно и следи инвестициите си по всяко време.

 - Управление на карти. Контролираш своите карти чрез замразяване, слагаш лимити за плащания, теглене както и по регион.



- Персонализиране на картите: Направете вашата карта уникална с нашата функция за персонализиран дизайн. Пригоди дизайна на твоята  карта лесно, отразявайки твоя индивидуален стил и предпочитания.
